tool_description: The fastest API to access countries, states, cities, continents, dial and zip codes in up to 20 languages. A collection of data APIs to support forms, signups, search and lookup. Our endpoints are optimized for speed and size. Our data is regularly maintained and comes from International Standardization bodies, the United Nations, government surveys and GIS datasets. We do not scrape WikiPedia etc
name: Referential
title: Referential

api_list.name: City by IP address (Geo IP)
api_list.description: Find a city, state, country and continent by IP address. For some results, the closest result within 10 miles will be provided.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: ip4 pr ip6 formatted IP address

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [geonameid, timezone,state_code,iso_a2]

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: List or search countries of the world in different languages.. Get iso a2, a3 country code and localized country name

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Filter on currency name in chosen lang

optional_parameters.name: dial_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on country dial code

optional_parameters.name: currency_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter currency code (ISO)

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return for each country [iso_a2, iso_a3, continent_code, dial_code, currency_code, currency_num_code, currency]

optional_parameters.name: iso_a2
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter iso country code

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Country name search string. Can be partial contains...

optional_parameters.name: continent_code
optional_parameters.description: Two letter region/continent code (eu, na, sa, as, af, oc, an). Lookup at /v1/continent.

optional_parameters.name: iso_a3
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter iso country code

optional_parameters.name: currency_num_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 3 digit numeric currency code (ISO)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

api_list.name: Cities
api_list.description: List and search over 75,000 world cities in 20 languages.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit results to N results

optional_parameters.name: state_hasc
optional_parameters.description: Filter on state's HASC code. List at /v1/state.

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Filter on timezone name. List at /v1/timezone.

optional_parameters.name: geonameid
optional_parameters.description: Filter on geonameid

optional_parameters.name: prefix
optional_parameters.description: Search by names starting with prefix. See also limit, order and sort fields.

optional_parameters.name: timezone_offset
optional_parameters.description: Filter on timezone offset in hours

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort on field [population, state_code, name, timezone, state_hasc, iso_a2]. Please see limit and order fields.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

optional_parameters.name: iso_a2
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Search as \"contains\" on city name in chosen lang

optional_parameters.name: state_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on state's ISO-3166-2 letter code. List at /v1/state

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2,state_code,timezone,timezone_offset,state_hasc,geonameid]

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: Sort order [asc | desc]

api_list.name: State
api_list.description: List the sub-regions/states/provinces/departments of the world's countries

optional_parameters.name: iso_a2
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

optional_parameters.name: iso_3166_2
optional_parameters.description: Filter on Subregion's ISO-3166-2 letter code

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to select in the result [iso_a2]

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter as \"contains\" on the states's name in chosen lang

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

api_list.name: Timezones
api_list.description: List the world's time zones in 20 languages

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Filter on non daylights savings offset in hours

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter as "contains" on timezone name in chosen lang

optional_parameters.name: code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 3 letter non daylight savings timezone code (not unique)

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Filter on timezone name in english

optional_parameters.name: daylights_offset
optional_parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings offset in hours

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

optional_parameters.name: daylights_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings letter code (not unique)

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [code,timezone,daylights_code,daylights_offset,daylights,hours_offset,offset]

optional_parameters.name: daylights
optional_parameters.description: Filter on daylights savings/non daylight savings timezones (true,false)

api_list.name: City by id
api_list.description: Direct lookup of over 75,000 cities by id. See the v1/city API to search for city ids.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2,state_code,timezone,timezone_offset,state_hasc]

api_list.name: Country by iso code
api_list.description: Get country by 2 letter iso code localized to a given language

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Comma deliminated list of fields to return in response

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: 2 letter iso language code to localize country name

api_list.name: State by id

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [iso_a2]

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en

api_list.name: Continent by id

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: Two letter iso continent code. Lookup /v1/continent.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Two letter iso 639-2 language code (i.e. en, sv, pl etc). Lookup /v1/lang.

optional_parameters.name: continent_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter continent code

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter on continent name (value field) as \"contains\"

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return for each continent [iso_a2, iso_a3, continent_code, dial_code, currency_code, currency_num_code, currency]

api_list.name: Continents
api_list.description: List continents of the world localized to requested language

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return for each continent [iso_a2, iso_a3, continent_code, dial_code, currency_code, currency_num_code, currency]

optional_parameters.name: continent_code
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter continent code

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Two letter iso 639-2 language code (i.e. en, sv, pl etc). Lookup /v1/lang.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter as "contains" on continent name in chosen lang

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.description: List the world's languages translated into 20 languages

optional_parameters.name: lang_3
optional_parameters.description: Filter by 3 letter ISO language code

optional_parameters.name: iso_a2
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [flag,iso_a2,lang_3,lang]

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Returns a language translated into lang language

api_list.name: Language by id
api_list.description: Find language by id translated into 20 languages

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: 2 letter iso language code. Lookup at /v1/lang.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Returns a language translated into lang language

optional_parameters.name: lang_3
optional_parameters.description: Filter by 3 letter ISO language code

optional_parameters.name: iso_a2
optional_parameters.description: Filter on 2 letter country code

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [flag,iso_a2,lang_3,lang]

api_list.name: Timezone by id

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [code,timezone,daylights_code,daylights_offset,daylights,hours_offset,offset]

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language selection ISO 639-2 letter code. Overrides Accept-Language header. Defaults to browser value. Default: en
